description.value: Vol. 1. Contents. Practical lessons in art needlework, crewel work, embroidery, macrame work, crochet, knitting, antimacassar braid and its use, bazaars, and what to make for them, bead work, braid work, crystoleum painting, fancy stitches, home decorations, kells embrodery, mirror painting, presents for gentlemen, smocking, terra cotta painting, netting and miscellaneous articles. -- Vol. 2. Contents. Practical lessons in art needlework, photograph painting, lace making, mountmellic embroidery, macrame work, crochet, knitting, bead work, home decoration, bazaar articles, patchwork, wool flowers, fan decoration, drawn linen, crochet netting, and miscellaneous articles
